channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: One Of TV’s Best Mystery Shows Returns With A 100% Perfect Critic Score
item.description: The best new show to hit TV in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: ‘Running Point’ Dethroned Again In Netflix’s Top 10 List By The Same Show
item.description: Here's what new show has knocked Running Point off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list again.

item.title: AI Predictions On 2025 Supply Shortages And Industry Impact
item.description: Supply chain disruptions are here to stay, it seems, and they’re reaching new levels of complexity.
